policy_config_auto_disconnect: Auto disconnect user connected session when same user relogin
policy_config_suspend_users: Suspend users account when credit has been exhausted
policy_config_remember_user: Remember user credential for the next login
policy_config_sms_supported: Only SMS supported, please make sure SMS gateway is provided
policy_config_delete_unverified_acc: Delete unverified account ( for temporary access account, ie: email verification sign-up )
policy_config_max_num: Maximum number of MAC Address to be registered per account
policy_config_allowed: Allowed registered mac to login using registered Account
